description:
Bite into icy backroads or snowy, hard-packed singletrack with these ruggedly spiked all-mountain tires. These rugged trail-ready tires provide firm winter traction, yet remain surprisingly agile and sporty.

  • 402 spikes have a tungsten carbide core for durability
  • To ensure that spikes are permanently fixed, tires should be run in for about 40km on asphalt while avoiding any fast acceleration or heavy braking
  • RaceGuard belt protects against penetration punctures, while only minimally increasing weight and rolling resistance
  • Maximum load of 120kg
name: Schwalbe Ice Spiker Pro 29 x 2.25in. RaceGuard Studded Wire Tire
